article.aside: Renamed kplot_data_attach(3) and kplot_datas_attach(3) to kplot_attach_data(3) and kplot_attach_datas(3), respectively. Added a KPLOT_LINESPOINTS plotting type to kplot_attach_data(3). Added kplot_attach_smooth(3) functionality, for the time being with only a moving average and CDF generator. Removed kplot_data_remove_all(3) (to be re-added and re-named when necssary). Added kdata_max(3) and kdata_min(3). Modified kdata_bucket_set(3) to accept both the x and y values. Fixed kdata_hist_add(3) and kdata_hist_set(3) range checks. Added KPLOTS_YERRORBAR to kplot_attach_datas(3).
